name: Cones in Space
description:
Welcome, to CONES IN SPACE. The single greatest survival game you will ever play in your lifetime.

Cones in Space is a sci-fi survival game where you play as a cone, and you guessed it: in space!

In Cones in Space you are tasked with surviving a year on this planet, but it isn't as easy as it seams! After summer a thick poisonous fog covers the planet, and you must plunder the surrounding planets in search of recourses to craft a cure, or suffer a terrible fate..

What can you do in Cones in Space? A good question! There are many epic features in cones in space, these include:
>Building
>Fighting
>Crafting
>Sailing
>trading
>exploring
>farming
>Building epic auto farms

If you like super cool space themed survival games, then Cones in Space is a must play for you!
